definitions: a person who legally takes another's child and brings it up as their own

examples.text: misunderstandings about adoption are contributing to a serious shortage of adopters

shortDefinitions: person who legally takes another's child and brings it up as their own

definitions: a person or organization that chooses to take up, follow, or use something

examples.text: consumers have been eager adopters of some new payment technologies

shortDefinitions: person that chooses to take up or use something
